name: DoctorAtWork.com
overview:
“Doctor At Work” - the world’s largest Russian-speaking community of physicians.

“Doctor At Work” is a winner of “Start-up of the year 2011” HSE, one of the leaders of the rating of “30 most promising startups in Russian internet” Pruffi, winner of “Best Media Entrepreneur in Russia in 2011”.

Site provide full range of communication services for healthcare institutions, pharmaceutical companies who is looking for access to the handpicked group of practicing physicians.

Audience: • 92 000 verified physicians • 60 000 monthly active users and 5 000 daily active users • average time on site is 450 minutes per month (based on Alexa.com and Google Analytics). • 80% of our users live in Russia • user growth rate - 5% monthly (organic)

Team: • team size is 12 full time people, • marketing, IT & Medicine professionals • sales leader has 15 years experience in pharma sales and previously held a executive position in top research agency

Awards: • Start-up of the Year 2011 (HSE) • Best Entrepreneur of the Year 2011 (British Council) • Russia Top-30 Internet teams 2012 (Pruffi)

Market overview: • pharmaceutical market in Russia exceeds $20 bln a year • $2 bln - communications with physicians • we assume 10% of it ($200 mln per year) years will go to online communications in 2-3 years • we aim to get 10% of physicians internet communications market (this is around $20 mln.) • primary revenue channels: Research (now 50% of revenue), E-detailing (50%) and future major product is E-Rep • 4 of 10 world top pharma companies (Roche, Takeda-Nycomed, Johnson&Johnson, Teva), 3 of 5 world top research agencies (GfK, M3, WorldOne) and 1 of 5 world top medical equipment producers (3M) among our clients

Tech: • very flexible site platform that allows us to work on multiple languages • online research panel.

milestones.description: Launched Russia's first closed social network for medical students - Medcampus
